author: jeremias
msg: Ability to restrict the testcases being processed to one for debugging. Just specify its filename as a system property "fop.layoutengine.single".

author: jeremias
msg: More extensive checking. Use eval instead of true where appropriate.

author: jeremias
msg: XObject.str() fails the second time it is called. Makes debugging difficult. Get the result string early.

msg: Alloc IPD/BPD, too, not just content IPD/BPD.
